sentences.sentence: Israeli airstrikes killed at least 28 Palestinians in Gaza's southern city, Rafah, early on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: An overnight Russian drone strike on Kharkiv, Ukraine's second-largest city, has killed at least seven people, including three children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Although still awaiting acceptance into the alliance, Sweden has already started sending troops to NATO's front line in Latvia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Faced with Russia, security is set to dominate Finland's runoff presidential election on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Israeli airstrikes killed at least 28 Palestinians in Rafah early on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The attack occurred only hours after Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced plans to evacuate hundreds of thousands of people from the southern Gaza city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: During the night, three airstrikes hit homes in Rafah and killed multiple members of three families.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ten children died.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The youngest was three months old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The IDF is coming to take us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They have bombed Rafah and the north.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There are more than a thousand bombs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The world is not moving.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: During the night on Saturday, the IDF Air Force struck targets in the outskirts of Syria's capital, Damascus. Syria's official news agency, Sana, says the airstrikes were launched from the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights. Britain-based War Monitor, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, said one of the strikes hit a residential building. It reported three unidentified people were killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A Russian drone strike on Kharkiv, Ukraine's second-largest city, killed at least seven

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: people overnight, including three children, the region's governor reported on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He said the Iranian-made Shaheed drones hit civilian infrastructure in the city, causing a massive fire that burned down 15 houses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian Air Force said its air defense systems destroyed 23 out of 31 Iranian drones launched by Russia overnight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The drones primarily targeted the northeastern Kharkiv region and the southern province of Odessa, it governor, four people were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: NATO international teams are preparing camp to house Swedish troops in Latvia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: While Sweden hasn't formally finalized its membership yet, it's already starting to operate actively within the alliance's frameworks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Stockholm is soon to send a battalion unit of about 600 to 800 soldiers and heavy armor to become part of NATO's Enhanced Forward Presence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This Canadian-led multinational task force is the very first defense line against potential Russian invasion into Baltic countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, US Marines are practicing their skiing skills in northern Norway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: US commanders assure that the experience received in the unfriendly winter region will help troops to fight better in any kind of extreme conditions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Faced with Russia, security is set to dominate the runoff vote for Finland's next president on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: next president on Sunday. The candidates are former centre-right Prime Minister Alexander Stubb and ex-foreign minister Pekka Havisto of the Greens. Both call for Finland, which recently joined NATO, to take a tough stance against Russia. Stubb leads the polls, but Havisto is gaining ground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some people will make their minds up on Saturday perhaps, even Sunday, on the election day, so they're campaigning very actively to the end, but it's unlikely that any new openings things will be visible in the last few days. What makes the situation exciting is that the gap between them has been narrowing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The candidates of the far-right Finns party and the Liberal Centre party were eliminated in the first round. Their voters, up to 20% of the electorate, could be crucial in deciding the final outcome.
